Package com.designPatterns.Mediator

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ChatMediator
    ChatMediator interface defines the structure of the Mediator that will be used in order allow different objects to communicate to each other.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChatClient
    ChatClient creates and then adds some users to the userList and then test the Mediator Design Pattern by sending message to all users in the list.
    ChatMediatorImplementation
    ChatMediatorImplementation will actually do the task of allowing different User Objects to communicate to each other.
    User
    Abstract User class have Reference of chatMediator UserName Methods for sending and receiving messages.
    UserImpl
    UserImpl to the actual task of sending and receiving the messages.
